main.name: Ashish Patil
main.jobDescription: clean code and pixel perfect design. I also make website more & more interactive with web animations.
main.bio: I am a Front-end Developer with few months of professional experience. I build successful websites and web-apps that are fast, easy to use, and coded with the same eye for detail as a designer. I started coding from the August 2019 after completing my engineering. I have serious passion for modern looking websites with a little bit of animations. I use the modern frameworks such as React to design the website you want. I will write the code and get it perfect until you have the exact website you want ! If you have an application idea in mind and looking for a front-end developer to create magic and to convert your idea into a beautiful website then you are at the right place.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.school: St.Vincent Pallotti College of Engineering & Technology

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: I am learning how to provide clean code and pixel perfect design. I am trying to make website more & more interactive with web animations.

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: We designed the web based application a.k.a ATCO Log Register which is used for creating and maintaining the daily log hours, assessing the validity, Elpa and medical fitness of Air Traffic Control Officers.

work.title: ASP.NET Developer
work.description: We designed and developed Smart attendance management system which is an android based application for taking, calculating attendance and asking the queries over the app.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my personal projects so far. It's essential that i have a tool like Git to manage multiple processes involved with web development. Git allows me to release development changes faster and minimizes potentially negative impacts on my projects.

skills.name: Bootstrap 4
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

projects.title: Covid-19 Info
projects.category: Covid-19 App for Displaying total number of patients worldwide.

projects.title: Image Finder App
projects.category: Online image finding app using piaxabay API.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.category: Website I built using template for my personal use.

projects.title: Resume
projects.category: A React based resume website template.

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Ashish on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Ashish is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
